comment: Призрак сидит на коленях перед пиктограммой внутри руин, затем исчезает

languages.text: "Что... Это я выдолбил? Почему я ничего не помню..."

traits.locale_text: "Что... Это я выдолбил? Почему я ничего не помню..."

languages.text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
languages.original_text: "Что... Это я выдолбил? Почему я ничего не помню..."

traits.locale_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
"What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
"What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
"What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
"What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

languages.text: “这个东西……是我刻上去的吗？可我怎么什么都不记得了……”
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

traits.locale_text: “这个东西……是我刻上去的吗？可我怎么什么都不记得了……”

languages.text: «¿Qué...? ¿He hecho yo esto? ¿Por qué no recuerdo nada?...».
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué...? ¿He hecho yo esto? ¿Por qué no recuerdo nada?...».

languages.text: 「なんだと…これを彫ったのは私なのか？どうして記憶がないんだ…」
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

traits.locale_text: 「なんだと…これを彫ったのは私なのか？どうして記憶がないんだ…」

languages.text: "Was ... Habe ich das herausgearbeitet? Warum kann ich mich an nichts erinnern ...?"
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

traits.locale_text: "Was ... Habe ich das herausgearbeitet? Warum kann ich mich an nichts erinnern ...?

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que... C'est moi qui ai gravé ça ? Pourquoi je ne me souviens de rien... ? »
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que... C'est moi qui ai gravé ça ? Pourquoi je ne me souviens de rien... ? »

languages.text: "Ne... Bunu ben mi kazıdım? Niye hiçbir şey hatırlayamıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "What... Was it me who carved this out? Why can't I remember anything..."
